Posts.Content: Allison, it's very normal to be feeling down. I go through it as well as i'm sure alot of survivors do. I look at it as the cancer is gone, that was the worst part, I'll take whatever treatment is given to me because at least I get to live to make that choice and every day is a new page and every week is a new chapter iny book.
Posts.Title: Hello... Looking for someone to talk to
